projs.title: KGST
projs.about: A Rust library containing the implementation of a K-Truncated Generalized Suffix Tree using Ukkonen's Algorithm, along with a CLI tool to quickly build and serialize KGST's.

projs.title: dotfiles
projs.about: The window manager config I use in my linux setup.

projs.title: plyparse
projs.about: Plyparse is a simple CLI tool to convert the encoding format of .ply files

projs.title: Othello-RL
projs.about: A simple python implementation of a TD-lambda RL agent to play othello
